places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Ashoka Grand
address: Patel Babu Road, Bhikhanpur, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812002, India

reviews.text: I had a great experience. I arrived at the hotel the day after my booking day due to train delay. I requested them to give me room for 1-2 hours to just freshen up. They had no need to help me at all as my arrival was after the checkout time of my booked day. But, the receptionist and the management was so kind that they accepted my request, and were sweeter to keep my bags when I was out for work.

The room was really clean and very spacious. The WiFi was good and the staff very friendly. Hot water was working in the bathroom and you also have a kettle. I didn't go to the breakfast. The bad point is that it was really noisy, the road was always crowded. And it is really expensive for India, I stayed in places as good as this one for 3 times less this price.

I booked this hotel for ring ceremony and the services they provided were pathetic.. They promised a lot and did nothing.. First of all there were scarcity of hotel staff. They served cold food to the people. There were not enough staff to handle the gathering of 100 people.. And the taste of the food was below poor.. Please anyone don't book this hotel for any purpose they will just loot your hard earned money and you will regret later... Take this as a warning.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Vaibhav
address: Kachari Chowk, MG Rd, near Indian Oil Petrol Pump, Bhikhanpur, Bhagalpur, Bihar 812001, India

reviews.text:
have not stayed in the room so not sure how the rooms are but have visited their restaurant many times and can say it's quite good. Food taste is good, service is also prompt and fast.
I think Vaibhav has one of the biggest dining hall in the city. so you almost never need any reservation before visiting the restaurant.
Price is on higher side. meal for 4 usually costs around 3K per visit, but As taste, ambiance and service is good, it justifies.
A few bad experiences with the restaurant are occasional bad taste and once I got chicken slices in my veg pasta, that too when Navratre was being celebrated. most of the non veg eater don't eat non veg this period and I am pure vegetarian.
Shocked? even I was.  But it had happen with me many times in different restaurants around the world.So I didn't cared much about. But I felt bad when they even charged me for the pasta.
At least as a gesture of sorry they shouldn't charge for it.
rest every is good with the restaurant and despite a few more minor bad experiences with the restaurant. I and my family usually prefer to be there for outings.

The service at the hotel restaurant was terrible, and the person at the reception was incredibly rude. It felt like they didn't care about the time or our experience at all. Yar hotel khola hai ya chutiyo ka foj ekattha kiya hai.

Hotel Vaibhav is a great choice for travellers looking for a 3 star star hotel in Bhagalpur. This Hotel stands out as one of the highly recommended hotel in Bhagalpur. Hotel is rated 3.4 out of 5, which is considered as very good.

The room was unhygienic, full of mosquitos, so could not sleep in night. The noisy AC was another reason of disturbance. Rooms are very old. The staff behavior is kind of unprofessional and immature type. Receptionist tried to be over-smart. Over all does not meet expectation.
Located at heart of Bhagalpur. Delicious food is served. Enjoy roof top dinner with beautiful scenery.

reviews.text:
Never been to their rooms as I am a local and have visited their restaurant only. So consider my review is for restaurant
Restaurant has two sections, one is open air section and another is covered air conditioned. Both are good place to sit and enjoy quality time with your family. Unfortunately being a roof top restaurant one can expect good views but unfortunately nothing remarkable can be seen from here.
Ambiance is good overall and service staff is attentive. Unfortunately cleaning is the section where the restaurant lacks a bit.
one of the costliest restaurants in the city, so be ready to pay big money.
Big price can be accepted if food is good. But now a day’s food is not as good as it used to be. Still one of the best food served in city.

Below is my input after staying at this property.... I hope it will help someone to decide on right hotels in Bhagalpur.

1. My booking was including Breakfast, but they deducted the amount. This was unfairly done. Commitment to customer should be on top priority.
2. They will make you wait after you checked out and paid the amount. You will not be allowed to go till they done with their investigation inside room. Look like they consider every customer as a thief or something??  This behavior is not good at all by this hotel.
3. No hot water.
4. Power outage.
5. Wifi will stop working after sometime.
6. Bathroom was not neat and clean.

Still I gave 2 star for look and feel. Apart from this I would not recommend this hotel to anyone, especially couple and family.
